entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon.
